news_header: North Korea denies allegations of sending troops to Russia for the Ukrainian War, calling them inappropriate rumors.
news_text: A member of the UN delegation stated that North Korea has not sent troops to Russia for the Ukrainian War, dismissing South Korea's allegations as attempts to tarnish North Korea's image. The spokesperson emphasized that there is no need to comment on such rumors. While soldiers are training in the Far East of Russia for deployment, North Korea's state media has remained silent on the issue. Russia has not confirmed the troop deployment but has defended its military cooperation with North Korea.
